text: @GavinNewsom Assumption of risk. It's a legal concept. Maybe everyone who doesn't agree there is a pandemic will agree to sign a document that they will not take medical care because they have assumed the risk? Win win. Go play. I'll stay home and pray for my Mom all who are fighting Covid-19
